existingReports.title: Products sold today
existingReports.description: Shows a list of products sold within the current day.

existingReports.title: Sales and taxes for this fiscal year
existingReports.description: Displays total sales and tax information for the fiscal year to date.

existingReports.title: Employee performance with customers this month
existingReports.description: Shows the performance metrics of employees in customer interactions for the current month.

existingReports.title: Sales by terminal made the last week
existingReports.description: Provides data on sales made through each terminal in the last seven days.
